titles.title: Play by the Rules Act of 2018
A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to prevent the circumvention of antidumping and countervailing duties by nonmarket economy countries, and for other purposes.
Play by the Rules Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Play by the Rules Act of 2018
This bill amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to subject to antidumping and countervailing duties certain merchandise from nonmarket economies that would otherwise be exempt.
